nodes.label: Sovereign Debt
nodes.description: National/subnational inability to service debt obligations; currency-crisis correlation
nodes.analogues: 1997 Asian Crisis, 2001 Argentina, 2012 Eurozone, 2022 Sri Lanka

nodes.label: Corporate Debt
nodes.description: Private sector rollover risk, default waves, credit market freezing

nodes.label: Banking Stress
nodes.description: Solvency/liquidity crises; credit crunch; depositor flight
nodes.analogues: 1997 Asian banking, 2008 GFC, 2023 US regional banks

nodes.label: Asset Bubbles
nodes.description: Commercial/residential real estate; commodity supercycles; overvaluation corrections
nodes.analogues: 1989-92 S&L crisis, 1990 Japan, 2006-12 US housing, 2014-16 commodities

nodes.label: Tipping Points
nodes.description: Approach to irreversible Earth system thresholds (ice sheets, permafrost, monsoons, etc.)
nodes.analogues: Paleoclimate records (Eemian, Pliocene); no modern analogues

nodes.label: Extreme Weather
nodes.description: Statistical anomalies in temperature, precipitation, storms; compound events
nodes.analogues: 2003 EU heatwave, 2010 Russia drought, 2017 Harvey, 2021 PNW heat dome, 2022 Pakistan floods

nodes.label: Carbon Cycle
nodes.description: Anomalies in atmospheric CO2, CH4, ocean absorption; feedback acceleration

nodes.label: Ecosystem Collapse
nodes.description: Biodiversity loss, biome shifts, keystone species decline; functional extinction
nodes.analogues: Pleistocene extinctions, 19th c. bison, 20th c. cod fisheries

nodes.label: Interstate Conflict
nodes.description: War between states; great power confrontation; alliance activation
nodes.analogues: 1914 WWI, 1939 WWII, 1973 Yom Kippur, 1991 Gulf War, 2022 Ukraine

nodes.label: Intrastate Violence
nodes.description: Civil war, insurgency, state collapse, genocide; spillover effects

nodes.label: Resource Competition
nodes.description: Conflict over water, energy, minerals, arable land; scarcity violence
nodes.analogues: 1967 Six-Day War, 1990 Gulf War, Nile basin tensions

nodes.label: Governance Decay
nodes.description: Democratic backsliding, institutional erosion, elite capture, rule of law breakdown

nodes.label: Infrastructure Failure
nodes.description: Cascading failures in energy grids, telecom, supply chains; single points of failure
nodes.analogues: 2003 NE blackout, 2011 Japan tsunami, 2021 Suez blockage

nodes.label: Cyber Risk
nodes.description: Critical infrastructure attacks; supply chain compromises; financial system attacks

nodes.label: AI/Compute
nodes.description: Frontier model concentration, compute monopolies, capability overhang; accident risk
nodes.analogues: No direct analogues; closest: nuclear proliferation, 2008 derivatives

nodes.label: Pandemic Risk
nodes.description: Novel pathogen emergence, antimicrobial resistance, lab accident; GCBR potential

nodes.label: Food System
nodes.description: Supply chain concentration, monoculture risk, fertilizer/energy dependency; price volatility
nodes.analogues: 2007-08 food crisis, 2020 COVID disruption, 2022 Ukraine blockade

nodes.label: Cascade Interactions
nodes.description: Explicit cross-theme connections; feedback loops; compounding effects

nodes.label: Correlation Clusters
nodes.description: Synchronous stress across multiple systems; global phase transitions
